name: Star Defender 4 (Premium)
description:
Ready to fight?! Then go ahead! Start your space battle in Star Defender 4 and prevent impudent aliens from conquering the Earth!

Who can give a dare to numerous hordes of Insectus and to protect the native Galaxy? What do the Black Holes hide inside them and where do they lead? To answer these questions one should become a hero of Star Defender 4 who is brave and strong enough to break this dark silence. Humanity has nothing to do but to keep their faith and believe that their first pilot will be able to accomplish the task and come back home safe and sound. If you want to feel as you were the Intergalactic Disinfector # 1 who craves for taking vengeance on that disgusting annoying insects… If you long for the real war - then Star Defender 4 is for you! Hold your breath…

GAME FEATURES
- A wide array of alien spacecrafts
- 8 large missions with a huge Boss at the end of each one
- More than 100 gripping levels
- A system of bonuses including Time-Freeze, Missile Strike, Immortality
- New Star Defender 4 unique weapons
- Become the hero of Star Defender 4!
- Still not sure? Then try free version - Star Defender 4 (Free)
